713993f-a.title: Manhattan: 59th Street - 1st Avenue
713993f-a.text:
59th Street, north side, east from First Avenue, with the Queens-
borough Bridge in the background.
September 20, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

707642f-b.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 59th St.
707642f-b.text:
(1)
First avenue, east side, north from 59th Street; seen t
the arch of the Queensboro Bridge approach.
A boy is stealing a ride on a north-bound street car of
Second Avenue 1ine. kt the time of this picture, thi
is about to be discontinued and replaced by bus servi
March 5, 1933.
L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, showing a south-bound street car.
March 5, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

713992f-a.title: Manhattan: 59th Street - 1st Avenue
713992f-a.text:
5Vth Street, west from First Avenue. In the background are the
hotels Delmonico and Sherry-Netherland, in a direct line with
the camera, so that they seem to be one building, and to the
left, the Hotel Pierre.
March S, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
